page.title: 04SUNDAY LIFE OF CHRIS. RIDGE
page.content: A{typical Sunday}for me is to get up at{8.45am}and make{breakfast.} {Go to work}visiting old people. I get home from work, put a{chicken}in the oven,{cook vegetables}and{ {Yorkshire Pudding.} I{hoover}and{dust,}then{clean}my son's football trophies. My next job is to put the{dinner {out,}then watch{television,}whilst my {husband washes up.} While watching TV, I{crochet}baby clothes for my sister. Time then for my bath, after which I prepare a{salad tea.} Visitors arrive so I make them{tea} and{biscuits. } After tea I{iron}my sons' clothes and{make supper.}I usually get out{my {sewing machine}to make, or repair clothes. Later I watch{TV,}and go to bed at{12.30am. }
